name: stock_v2_get_competitors
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the competitors of a stock based on its performance ID.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock, typically retrieved from /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.
